title: How to Bake a Queens Cake

steps.headline: Add cake mix, water, canola oil and eggs to mixing bowl.
Beat on low speed until moistened.
Increase mixer speed to high and beat batter for 2 minutes.
Grease and flour a 9 x 13-inch (23 x 33 cm) baking pan.
Pour the batter into the baking pan.
Bake at 350ºF (180ºC) for 25 to 30 minutes or until cake tests done.
Add softened margarine to mixing bowl.
Add cocoa, instant coffee and salt, then beat until fluffy.
Add milk and vanilla; beat until well mixed.
Add powdered sugar slowly and continue to beat until mixture is creamy and fluffy.

text: Cake Add cake mix, water, canola oil and eggs to mixing bowl.  Beat on low speed until moistened.  Increase mixer speed to high and beat batter for 2 minutes.  Grease and flour a 9 x 13-inch (23 x 33 cm) baking pan.  Pour the batter into the baking pan.  Bake at 350ºF (180ºC) for 25 to 30 minutes or until cake tests done.  Cool cake completely.  Frosting Add softened margarine to mixing bowl.  Add cocoa, instant coffee and salt, then beat until fluffy.  Add milk and vanilla; beat until well mixed.  Add powdered sugar slowly and continue to beat until mixture is creamy and fluffy.  Frost cooled cake.
